title: LinkFree - Open Source Contributor
description: Contributed to LinkFree, an open-source alternative for LinkTree, by adding my profile to their data section. As a result, I was able to create a personalized site for hosting my links. This experience allowed me to learn more about open source development and gave me the opportunity to contribute to a project with a growing community

title: TellerOne - Backend Dev Intern
description: During my internship at TellerOne, a financial institution startup in Lagos, Nigeria, I worked as a backend developer, using Spring Boot and Axon Framework to refactor codes, and work on assigned tickets to create endpoints for our microservices application

title: IT support - Elite Class
description: I work closely with other members of the technical team to ensure that all systems are integrated, secure, and functioning correctly. I am also be responsible for training other team members on using Google software tools and providing technical support when necessary. I am responsible for creating and maintaining the technological infrastructure that enables the Elite Class to operate efficiently and effectively

title: Freelance - Graphics Designer
description: I have worked as a graphics designer, where I developed a deep understanding of design principles and web flows. This experience has given me the ability to create visually appealing designs and use the right keywords to achieve desired outcomes in online marketing
